subject: [Radiance-general] librtrad.a
body:
On Oct 26, 2006, at 5:23 PM, Gregory J. Ward wrote:


Ha!


Cool, thanks for the education on the various EOL variants, but I'm
really a lot more excited about the fact that my calling myself an
idiot is now a matter of public record, on the radiance-online
archives.  Excellent!  =8-)

- Rob
